name: antigravity-context-monitor
description: Real-time context window usage monitor for Antigravity (实时显示 Antigravity 当前会话的上下文窗口使用量和剩余量)

commands.title: Show Context Window Details / 显示上下文窗口详情
Refresh Context Window Monitor / 刷新上下文窗口监控

configuration.title: Antigravity Context Monitor / 上下文监控设置

antigravityContextMonitor.pollingInterva.description: Polling interval in seconds / 轮询间隔（秒）

antigravityContextMonitor.contextLimits.description: Model context window limits (in tokens). Key is the model's internal ID. Override if needed. IDs: MODEL_PLACEHOLDER_M37=Gemini 3.1 Pro (High), MODEL_PLACEHOLDER_M36=Gemini 3.1 Pro (Low), MODEL_PLACEHOLDER_M18=Gemini 3 Flash, 1008=Gemini 3.0 Pro (High), 1007=Gemini 3.0 Pro (Low), MODEL_PLACEHOLDER_M35=Claude Sonnet 4.6, MODEL_PLACEHOLDER_M26=Claude Opus 4.6, MODEL_OPENAI_GPT_OSS_120B_MEDIUM=GPT-OSS 120B / 各模型上下文窗口大小（token 数），key 为模型内部 ID。如需可自行覆盖。
